Banner_title: Your own eBike in exchange for a monthly subscription
Banner_Paragraph: Feel the e-vibes! We'll take care of all the hassle you don't want to care of (maintenance, theft...).
Home_Section2_box1_paragraph: Choose amongst our curated selection of e-vehicles, or reach out to us for expert advice.
Home_Section2_box3_paragraph: It will take no more than 2 minutes to register, and you will be able to manage your subscription 100% online.
Home_Section2_box5_paragraph: Have it delivered at home, or come pick it up!
Home_Section2_box2_paragraph: You can select the service level you desire, we have a plan for every use case.
Home_Section2_box4_paragraph: The monthly subscription will be charged automatically to the registered card.
Home_Section3_heading: We have a wide range of vehicles: For delivery and urban use!
Home_Section5_box1_paragraph: Pay a monthly fee, we take care of everything.
Home_Section5_box2_paragraph: Always available, always in perfect conditions.
Home_Section5_box3_paragraph: Use it the time you need it, return it when you don't.
Home_Section5_box4_paragraph: We bear the wear&tear of the bike, so we make sure they are super-quality.
Home_Section5_box5_paragraph: If you make a responsible use, of course.
Home_Section5_box6_paragraph: As cheap as public transport alternatives, and much nicer.
Home_Testimonial1: Business with principles and quality, we are lucky to have them so close and lucky to have known this service, in the company we are delighted by the speed with which they respond to problems and the solutions they provide. Renting this type of bicycle has saved us money on our mobility bill. An e-bike allows us to make deliveries in Madrid, saving time and fuel. Thanks for everything Wifly!!!
Home_Testimonial2: I have wanted an electric bike for a long time and Wifly adapts perfectly to my needs. Very good bikes, a lot of variety and unbeatable treatment. You choose the one you like the most, the plan that best suits you and they take care of everything. I once had a problem with a bike and they solved it immediately. You avoid traffic jams, you don't pollute, you move quickly... I give it 5 stars because putting anything else would be unfair. They deserve it.
Timeline_Banner_Heading: As easy as a TV subscription
Timeline_Banner_Paragraph: Register online in less than 2 minutes and choose if you want to test the vehicles in our stores or receive it at home.
Timeline_Box1_Paragraph: Choose amongst our curated selection of e-vehicles, or reach out to us for expert advice.
Timeline_Box2_Paragraph: You can select the service level you desire, we have a plan for every use case.
Timeline_Box3_Paragraph: It will take no more than 2 minutes to register, and you will be able to manage your subscription 100% online.
Timeline_Box4_Paragraph: The monthly subscription will be charged automatically to the registered card.
Timeline_Box5_Paragraph: Have it delivered at home, or come pick it up!
